global star Priyanka Chopra is one of the renowned actresses in the industry, She leaves no stone unturned in shelling out her acting skills. Currently, the diva is back home, India as PeCee is promoting for her much-awaited series Citadel along with Richard Madden.Priyanka Chopra announces new projectLast night (April 6), Our Desi Girl took to Instagram, shared an update on her new project, and captioned, \"On to the next @idriselba @johncena @naishuller @amazonstudios.\"          View this post on Instagram            A post shared by Priyanka (@priyankachopra) ]]>Moreover, the details of the film are currently being kept under wraps, the shoot will begin in May. Helmed by Ilya Naishuller, Heads of State is being produced by Safran Company’s Peter Safran and John Rickard. Well, Priyanka’s global debut series Citadel was just about to get released and now fans have got another good news from his professional front. Besides this,  on Tuesday (April 4), the official makers organised a premiere in Mumbai which Priyanka and her co-star Richard Madden. Varun Dhawan, who will star in the Indian version of Citadel, was also spotted at the event with the director duo Raj and DK. Other celebs marked their presence at the event were Rekha, Sanya Malhotra, Nora Fatehi, Neha Dhupia and others.The Bollywood actress also shared a video on her Instagram handle, offering a glimpse of the event. In the caption, she wrote, \"Kicking off the incredible world tour of #Citadel in my home city. With all the good wishes from my home and my people, my heart is full.\" For the event, Priyanka wears a printed teal blue dress, while Richard opts for a pant-suit set.Meanwhile, more details about Heads of State are yet to be revealed by the official makers. Helmed by Ilya Naishuller, Heads of State is being produced by Safran Company’s Peter Safran and John Rickard. Well, Priyanka’s global debut series Citadel was just about to get released and now fans have got another good news from his professional front. Besides this,  on Tuesday (April 4), the official makers organised a premiere in Mumbai which Priyanka and her co-star Richard Madden. Varun Dhawan, who will star in the Indian version of Citadel, was also spotted at the event with the director duo Raj and DK. Other celebs marked their presence at the event were Rekha, Sanya Malhotra, Nora Fatehi, Neha Dhupia and others.The Bollywood actress also shared a video on her Instagram handle, offering a glimpse of the event. In the caption, she wrote, \"Kicking off the incredible world tour of #Citadel in my home city. With all the good wishes from my home and my people, my heart is full.\" For the event, Priyanka wears a printed teal blue dress, while Richard opts for a pant-suit set.Meanwhile, more details about Heads of State are yet to be revealed by the official makers. Fellow actress Kangana Ranaut came out in support of Priyanka, slamming the people who had ganged up on Priyanka and lashing out at Karan Johar for banning her. Now, a an old video has surfaced online, where Karan Johar is seen saying he wanted to 'murder' Anushka Sharma's career. Karan Johar wants to murder Anushka Sharma's career   In the now viral video doing the rounds on social media, Karan Johar can be seen confessing that he had almost 'ruined' Anushka Sharma's career after he asked Aditya Chopra to not sign her for Rab Ne Bana di Jodi. Karan Johar had reportedly wanted Sonam Kapoor to be in the film. However, the Rocky Aur Rani Ki Prem Kahani director revealed he was impressed with Anushka in Band Baaja Baaraat.  During the 18th MAMI Mumbai Film Festival in 2016, Karan had accompanied the lead actors of his film Ae Dil Hai Mushkil Anushka Sharma and Aishwarya Rai for an on-stage interaction.  Karan had confessed on stage, \"I totally wanted to, completely murder Anushka Sharma's career. Because when Aditya Chopra showed me her image, I was like, ‘no, no, mad or what, you signing her, you crazy! There is no need for you to sign this Anushka Sharma'. There was another lead actress at that time who I wanted Adi to sign and I was totally behind the scene sabotaging her completely. The movie also I was reluctantly watching Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi.” Band Baaja Baaraat changed Karan’s perception However, Karan revealed that Anushka's performance in Band Baaja Baaraat completely changed his perception. He siad he called her since he felt like he owed her an apology and a compliment. \"Apology because I felt so embarrassed that I would have actually ruined the graph of an exceptional talent and secondly, a compliment because I thought she was amazing,\" the filmmaker said. Anushka Sharma made her debut with the hugely successful 2008 film Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi opposite Shah Rukh Khan. The film was directed by Aditya Chopra. Anushka Sharma will next be seen in the Netflix film Chakda Xpress. Now, according to the latest reports, renowned filmmaker Siddharth Anand is going to direct the big-ticket film Tiger Vs Pathaan, which is also a part of Yash Raj Films' Spy universe.Major update on Tiger Vs PathaanRecently, Bollywood trade analyst Taran Adarsh took to Twitter and announced a big news to world as he tweeted, \"BIGGG DEVELOPMENT… SALMAN KHAN - SHAH RUKH KHAN: SIDDHARTH ANAND TO DIRECT… #SalmanKhan and #ShahRukhKhan starrer #TigervsPathaan will be directed by #SiddharthAnand… Starts Jan 2024… Produced by #AdityaChopra. #YRF\"He further added, \"#TigervsPathaan will be the 7th film in #YRFSpyUniverse, which follows the events of #Pathaan, #Tiger3 and #War2.\" For the unversed, apart from Pathaan Siddharth Anand also directed Hrithik Roshan and Tiger Shroff starrer War. Tiger Vs Pathaan will be Siddharth Anand's third venture of Yrf Spy Universe. Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan were first seen together in the 1995 film Karan Arjun, and ever since then, the duo collaborated on and off on movies, making special appearances in each other’s films, including titles such as Zero, Kuch Kuch Hota Hai, and Hum Tumhare Hai Sanam. Shah Rukh is also said to be appearing in a cameo in Salman and Katrina Kaif’s third installment of the Tiger franchise.Meanwhile, on the work front, Salman Khan is looking forward to the release of Tiger 3, which will see Emraan Hashmi playing the role of an antagonist. main.articleBody: The global star Priyanka Chopra is one of the renowned actresses in the industry, She leaves no stone unturned in shelling out her acting skills. Currently, the diva is back home, India as PeCee is promoting for her much-awaited series Citadel along with Richard Madden.Priyanka Chopra announces new projectLast night (April 6), Our Desi Girl took to Instagram, shared an update on her new project, and captioned, "On to the next @idriselba @johncena @naishuller @amazonstudios."          View this post on Instagram            A post shared by Priyanka (@priyankachopra) ]]>Moreover, the details of the film are currently being kept under wraps, the shoot will begin in May. Helmed by Ilya Naishuller, Heads of State is being produced by Safran Company’s Peter Safran and John Rickard. Well, Priyanka’s global debut series Citadel was just about to get released and now fans have got another good news from his professional front. Besides this,  on Tuesday (April 4), the official makers organised a premiere in Mumbai which Priyanka and her co-star Richard Madden. Varun Dhawan, who will star in the Indian version of Citadel, was also spotted at the event with the director duo Raj and DK. Other celebs marked their presence at the event were Rekha, Sanya Malhotra, Nora Fatehi, Neha Dhupia and others.The Bollywood actress also shared a video on her Instagram handle, offering a glimpse of the event. In the caption, she wrote, "Kicking off the incredible world tour of #Citadel in my home city. With all the good wishes from my home and my people, my heart is full." For the event, Priyanka wears a printed teal blue dress, while Richard opts for a pant-suit set.Meanwhile, more details about Heads of State are yet to be revealed by the official makers. And, we can't wait to witness PeCee, John Cena and Idris Elba together!
main.headline: Priyanka Chopra, John Cena, Idris Elba Are All Set To Come Together For Heads Of State. Details Inside
main.keywords: Priyanka Chopra,Idris Elba,John Cena,Heads of State,Priyanka Chopra Films,Citadel,
main.description: Renowned actress, Priyanka Chopra is all ready for her next venture as she will be collaborating with Amazon Studios for Heads of State opposite John Cena and Idris Elba. Read on to know more about it!
